dublin_core.dcvalue: From 2006 onwards all members of the health insurance system in Germany will be issued an electronic health card which will replace the current health insurance card The new health card will be technically upgraded to also include patient related health data or provide access to such data in addition to its administrative functions Therefore it is evident that the health card be fitted with a microprocessor that permits authentication electronic identity check encryption and the electronic digital signature thus ensuring maximum data safety and security For easy identification of the insured person the electronic health card will bear a photograph of the card holder
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:29:53Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2005-07-08
[The introduction of the electronic health card in Germany].
